column2: Marauding Cats onboard an assault engine powered
column3: by Aku energies, riding out to conquer the wastes.

column2: Top-of-the-line weaponry built using stolen Aku tech.
column3: Its railgun obliterates all before it, to the very horizon.

column2: A weapon of mass destruction built with Aku tech.
column3: No weapon on the planet can stop its advance.
column4: Deals Massive damage to Zombies, Angels, and Aku.
